valid: For the period 06:00 (UTC) on Sat 1 Nov 2025 to 06:00 (UTC) on Sun 2 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low northern Ireland 982 expected 200 miles east of Iceland 978 by midnight tonight

Viking.text:
Wind
Southeasterly veering southwesterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first, decreasing 4 or 5 later.
Sea state
Rough or very rough.
Weather
Rain then showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally poor at first.
